about_the_game:
this game is Dark 4799 The game is set in the basement of a house as well as in the house itself where the player is trapped by an evil witch in the basement of the house.

The house is isolated from other houses in the forest.

The player is trapped in the basement where he is trying to get out of the basement and the house, and in order to succeed he must solve various puzzles (various keys that open various doors, various switches, mini-games, papers with instructions or various puzzles and more) and beware of the witch who pursues him throughout the adventure, and in order to escape from the witch, the player must hide in the closets so that the witch does not find him and kill him, and the same follows you throughout the game and tries to stop you from leaving the house

It is very important to play with logical thinking because the game consists of a lot of puzzles because if you want to pass the game, you have to think a lot because of the various puzzles that are inserted into the game and you have to think because the witch is lurking and trying to stop you so that you do not succeed in escaping from the house you need to read the letters throughout the game to pass the game You play against an advanced AI that learns from your every move. Expect the enemy to see where you are walking and find a shortcut to catch you, and if they see you trying to hide in a closet while running from the enemy, they will pull you out of the closet

content_descriptors.notes: The game features scenes of blood and dead people being murdered in the basement, and when the player enters the house, he is chased by a witch with a knife who wants to kill him.

detailed_description:
this game is Dark 4799 The game is set in the basement of a house as well as in the house itself where the player is trapped by an evil witch in the basement of the house.

The house is isolated from other houses in the forest.

The player is trapped in the basement where he is trying to get out of the basement and the house, and in order to succeed he must solve various puzzles (various keys that open various doors, various switches, mini-games, papers with instructions or various puzzles and more) and beware of the witch who pursues him throughout the adventure, and in order to escape from the witch, the player must hide in the closets so that the witch does not find him and kill him, and the same follows you throughout the game and tries to stop you from leaving the house

It is very important to play with logical thinking because the game consists of a lot of puzzles because if you want to pass the game, you have to think a lot because of the various puzzles that are inserted into the game and you have to think because the witch is lurking and trying to stop you so that you do not succeed in escaping from the house you need to read the letters throughout the game to pass the game You play against an advanced AI that learns from your every move. Expect the enemy to see where you are walking and find a shortcut to catch you, and if they see you trying to hide in a closet while running from the enemy, they will pull you out of the closet

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP7Vista/7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: 1 ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx 550 ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
